Note: currently only available for RSGallery2 2.x on Joomla 1.5.x, not for Joomla 2.5.x.

Note: currently only available for RSGallery2 2.x on Joomla 1.5.x, not for Joomla 2.5.x.

Anyone who wants to contribute, by answering questions from users, with bug fixes, new features, new (slideshow) templates, language file updates, etc., etc. is more than welcome to do so. Go to www.rsgallery2.nl and start sharing! (Note: RSGallery2 has always been and will always be a non-commercial project!)
